Package com.example.sprite.Controllers

    com.example.sprite
     
  • Class
    Description
    Authentication_Service
    Authentication_Service manages all authentication-related operations, including signing in, creating users, signing out, and user profile management.
    Authentication_Service.AuthCallback
    Callback interface for authentication results.
    Authentication_ServiceTest
    Android instrumented tests for the Authentication_Service class.
    DatabaseService
    DatabaseService provides an abstraction layer for all Firestore database operations.
    DatabaseServiceTest
    Android instrumented tests for the DatabaseService class.
    ImageService
     
    LotteryService
    This class handles lottery operations for events, including randomly selecting entrants from the waiting list and updating event participant data in Firebase.
    LotteryServiceTest
    Unit tests for LotteryService class, using mocks to avoid Firebase.
    NotificationService
    Service class responsible for managing notifications for entrants.
    NotificationService.NotificationCallback
    Callback interface for notification operations.
    NotificationService.NotificationListCallback
    Callback interface for retrieving multiple notifications.
    NotificationServiceTest
    Android instrumented tests for the NotificationService class.
    QRCodeService
    Service class responsible for generating and decoding QR codes for events in the Sprite app.
